title: My First Post

content: Hello! This is me! I finally setup my Github-pages and can start writing stuff as I please.Let’s try some Math and code.First is the Math.The Poisson Distribution equation is\begin{equation}f(k; \lambda) = \frac{\lambda^{k}e^{-\lambda}}{k!}\end{equation}And now a piece of code:class Human: def __init__(self): self.name = "Ali A. Mahani" self.birthday = "Feb. 25" self.hobbies = ["Squash", "Billiard", "Guitar"] def say_hi(self): print(f"Hi everyone! I'm {self.name}. I like {x + ", " for x in self.hobbies}.")me = Human()me.say_hi()Now we can go one our lives… Have fun :)
